ygData.subject: Re: Destruction
ygData.msgSnippet: Right in front of Astrotrain, a huge blast appears, then the energy disapears, and in the hole stands Wildrider. We done yet?

Right in front of Astrotrain, a huge blast appears, then the energy
disapears, and in the hole stands Wildrider. "We done yet?"
